name: Graffity Editor for CS:GO
description:
This editor application helps you combine and create original Counter strike graffity designs.

1. Select preferred background. You have option to choose from multiple CS:GO like backgrounds.
2. Add images to your design. You can choose from all the available CSGO graffity in all shapes and colors.
3. Customize your images. Rotate, scale or reorder every single image.
4. Add title to the design.
5. Save and share with your CSGO friends.
6. Get inspired by design in real counter strike game.

All of your created blueprints are available in gallery with ability to share or delete it.
